name: Hotel in Taito City · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
description:
酒店是由知名设计师设计，全屋以蓝黄黑为主色调.
每间房均带有独立卫浴，厨房，家电齐全，空调暖气等.
这是一间日式榻榻米房间.


★免费WI-FI:
房间有无线网络覆盖，给您的日常娱乐带来便利。

★交通:
御徒町站(步行7分钟)；仲御徒町(步行4分钟); 秋叶原站(步行12分钟):
3条线路可换乘,可以直达东京，银座，新宿，涉谷，上野等

★周边:
酒店位于住宅区,周边有多家24小时便利店､超市及各种美食店,可以满足日常生活需求｡

徒步12分钟可前往以电器商品闻名秋叶原电器街,不仅可以买到各种原产自日本的电器商品,动漫产品店和主题咖啡馆林立,可以让您近距离领略到秋叶原文化的魅力｡

neighborhood_overview: 比較的農地が残る閑静な住宅街です。大きな特色として、蘆花恒春園と祖師谷公園の2つの都立公園があり、子どもたちの遊び場、また豊かな緑は人々の憩いの場として知られています。春にはさくらまつり、秋には蘆花まつりやトライアングルフェスタなどのイベントも数多く催され、粕谷区民センターとともに地域活動の拠点となっています。
host_about:
Hi there! 
(Please feel free to ask me anything about TOKYO!! I would be happy to answer all questions;-))
 I am good at taking care of people and have great hospitality skills.
I have been Airbnb hosting since October 2015, and so far I have very much enjoyed guests from different places!! This Airbnb experience reminds me of when I was in Los Angles back in high school. It was a few decades ago though… I studied English in LA and stayed with a host family for 1 month, which was the most precious and unforgettable time in my life. I really appreciated my host family because they were very welcoming and treated me so well.
Like my host family in LA, I would like to take care of you and help you enjoy a wonderful stay in Tokyo!
I look forward to hosting you.

neighborhood_overview: Ueno  is a district in Tokyo's Taitō Ward, best known as the home of Ueno Park. Ueno is also home to some of Tokyo's finest cultural sites, including the Tokyo National Museum, the National Museum of Western Art, and the National Museum of Nature and Science, as well as a major public concert hall. The Kan'ei-ji, a major temple of the Tokugawa shōguns, stood in this area, and its pagoda is now within the grounds of the Ueno Zoo. Nearby is the Ueno Tōshō-gū, a Shinto shrine dedicated to Tokugawa Ieyasu. Near the Tokyo National Museum there is The International Library of Children's Literature. Just south of the station is the Ameya-yokochō, a street market district that evolved out of an open-air black market that sprung up after World War II. Just east is the Ueno motorcycle district, with English-speaking staff available in some stores.

The main train access you will be using while you stay here is the Sobu line which goes straight to Shinjuku, Akihabara and even Mitaka (Where the Ghibli museum is located)!

【About Shinjuku】

Shinjuku is one of the most popular districts of the whole town and is well know to be one of the center of night life in Tokyo. Also the center of entertainment you will find everything there from shopping, game centers and cat cafes to robot restaurants!

Among the most famous parts of the district you will find the Kabukicho, center of entertainment that gathers plenty of bar (even girls or boys bars ^^), Izakaya type restaurants (bar/restaurant) but also the place where you will find the Godzilla cinema, immense building on the side of which there is a huge Godzilla's statue.

neighborhood_overview:
"Yadoya Yanagodori East" is located in Asakusa. This area is center of the one of the most popular areas among both tourists and locals, where you can find the atmosphere of the ancient Japanese town and easy to access to cafes, restaurants and shops. 4 minutes away to Sensoji temple.

"Asakusa" 浅草
Asakusa is the district around Senso-ji Temple and Asakusa Shrine. Many streets here are Japanese “shotengai”, shopping streets with lots of small shops. Asakusa has always attracted many visitors, who come not only to visit temples and shrines but also to see performances such as “kabuki” theater, “manzai” comedy, and “rakugo” storytelling. It gets crowded during the Sanja Matsuri, the Sumida River Fireworks, and the Asakusa Samba Carnival. Make sure to check the calendar for the many local festivals and events taking place each year. You can explore on foot, take a rickshaw ride, or watch the city from a boat on Sumida River. Restaurants, bars, and cafés offer a great variet

name: Rental unit in Shinjuku City · ★4.83 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description:
東新宿坐落在熱鬧的新大久保商圈和高雅寧靜的住宅區之間,出了巷口右轉立即就是知名的韓國觀光街,沿路有生鮮蔬果店及接二連三的免稅藥妝、便利商店、韓式燒肉料理、24小時日系連鎖餐飲、咖啡店。四分鐘步行即可到達地鐵東新宿站,8-10分鐘可到達JR新大久保站。

J系列是全新完工的電梯大樓,每個房間有不同風格設計、裝潢和安全設備。室內採用無印良品床具並搭配高速無線網路、洗衣機及浴室空調乾燥乾衣功能、附毛巾吹風機等基本備品,讓您攜帶最少量的隨身行李即可舒適入住。

The space
這間房源大約八坪,最多可住兩位大人或兩位大人加一位小孩。所有房源都配有冷暖兩用空調、洗衣機、附暖氣淋浴間與浴室、含15個頻道的電視台,以及壁櫃。

1.提供齊全盥洗用具:毛巾、洗髮精、沐浴乳、牙刷、牙膏。
2.提供專業清潔服務:專人打掃;床單、被單、枕頭套都交由專業洗衣店清洗及燙整。

Guest access
1.廚房。 湯鍋、炒鍋、碗盤、餐具、微波爐、冰箱、洗碗液。
2.起居間。提供沙發、茶几、床、電視、空調。
3.衛浴設備。提供吹風機、乾燥烘衣功能、毛巾、盥洗用具、沐浴乳、洗髮精、洗手乳。
4.洗衣設備。提供洗衣機

Other things to note

退房時間:每日早上11點之前
請告知您的抵達時間。若需要提早或延遲,請在您預訂房間時提出。
若提早抵達可以距離公寓步行約5-8分鐘的DoMo飯店櫃台寄放行李(7am-10pm)

neighborhood_overview:
Sumida Ward is home to a famous cherry blossom viewing area (along the Sumida River near Asakusa Station) in spring and the Sumida River Fireworks Festival (Hanabi Matsuri) in summer. Perfect spot for romance-manic :)

The area also boasts a great many Tokyo landmarks such as Tokyo Skytree (you can literally see it from our place), cultural museums (Edo-Tokyo Museum and Tobu Museum), and Ryogoku Kokugikan (Tokyo's main sumo stadium). So if you wanna have a taste of daily yet unique Tokyo lives, don't miss those attractions.

With convenient rail lines and railway stations, you can explore other wards of Tokyo with ease since they bring you to everywhere you might wanna go as a tourist.

It would be a wise choice to start your journey with Japan from here :)
host_about:
【 WEIXIN /LINE: zaitochina】 

PS. 24:00-10:00有联系不到我们的可能性(不小心睡着了...Zzzzz),所以有问题的话,请务必提前告知哦｡ 

大家好!我们是一群热爱旅游,更热爱东京的的一个团队,叫做宅东｡我们从日本民宿法正式颁布开始,便在东京开启了合法民宿房东之旅!我们经营的大多数民宿都位于东京新地标——Skytree晴空塔附近｡我们的房源很多,您可以点房东主页查看心仪的房间~ 我们会中文和英文,但只懂些皮毛的日语(正在学习中!)｡如果您对我们的房源有任何疑问,欢迎随时给我们留言,我们会在第一时间解答您的困惑｡ 

Hey guys, we are TEAM ZAITO. We love traveling and also enjoy making new friends from different cultures. Most of our apartments are within walking distance from Tokyo Skytree. As a host, we know we still have a lot of growing and learning and work to do, but we will strive to offer you the best service so that you can have a five-star experience in Tokyo. More importantly, we welcome your precious advice of course! If you are interested in booking our place, please feel free to leave us a message, we’d be glad to help : )

host_about:
初めまして。嘉手納知幸（かてなともゆき）です。

私は、フロアボール（Foorball）というスポーツの日本代表のキャプテンをしていました。国際大会を通じて、ヨーロッパ、アメリカ、アジアなど20か国以上を訪れ、いろいろな外国の人達と出会い、国際交流の素晴らしさや楽しさを知りました。

そして、子どもたちの国際教育や英語教育のために、２０１３年ごろからホストファミリーを始めました。ホストファミリーを通じてもっと国際交流をしていき、少しでも日本の文化や伝統や良さを伝えていくことができたらいいなと考えています。

そして、あなたの国の文化や歴史も積極的に学びたいとも考えているので、ぜひいろいろと教えてください。

私の家族は、妻と息子2人の4人家族です。家族みな国際交流が大好きで、ノルウェー、フィンランド、カナダ、シンガポールの友人が泊まりに来てくれて、日本のガイドしたりもしています。ぜひ日本に来たときには、私の家に泊まりに来てくださいね。

私も妻も英語は少しですが話すことができますし、私の父も英語は得意なので、日本語が上手く話せなくても大丈夫です。

あなたにお会いできるのを楽しみにしています。

host_about:
OSTAYｸﾞﾙｰﾌﾟは世界一のﾎﾃﾙ･民泊運営会社を目標に掲げます｡大阪､東京､ﾊﾞﾝｺｸ､大理(中国)､貴州省(中国)を拠点に､既に1000室近くのﾎﾃﾙ･民泊を運営しており､ｾﾙﾌﾁｪｯｸｲﾝや高品質なﾍﾞｯﾄﾞ用品･ﾊﾞｽ用品､ｵﾝﾗｲﾝｶｽﾀﾏｰｻｰﾋﾞｽにより､顧客満足度の高い宿泊施設を目指します｡

2017年OSTAY扬帆起航,业务分布于“日本(大阪,东京),泰国(曼谷),中国(大理,贵州)”等地,致力于打造全球第一的智能化旅途休憩平台｡集团下管理和运营近千间房的酒店和民宿公寓,我们通过自助式入住､高质量的床品/洗浴用品､在线客服为您提供全方位的舒心住宿体验｡

In 2017, OSTAY sets sail, the business is distributed in "Japan (Osaka, Tokyo), Thailand (Bangkok), China (Dali, Guizhou)" and other places, committed to building the world's first intelligent journey rest platform. The Group manages and operates nearly 1,000 rooms of hotels and homestay. We provide you with a full range of comfortable accommodation experience through self-service check-in, high-quality bedding/toiletries, and  online customer service.

host_about:
Hello
My name is Hirofumi Masuda.
I had been in the US for 3 years, in Italy for 4 months, in Canada for 2 months. I had lived in SF, NY, Philly, Victoria island, Rome, and Florence.

And I also traveled to Netherland, Poland, Croatia, Thailand, China, and South Korea. 

There will be no language barriers between you and me.
When you have some problems, I will help you to solve those problems.
I know how hard to live in other countries because I experienced that.
I love people from all over the world.

My academic status

John Cabot University (Rome, Italy)
Temple University, Japan Campus (Tokyo, Japan)

Soccer is a part of my life. If you like it, please talk to me about it!!!

Please let me know if you are interested in staying here
I'll be happy to provide a room. :)

Carpe Diem
Hiro

neighborhood_overview:
About Shinjuku
Shinjuku is one of the biggest cities in Tokyo. Great spot for shopping, sightseeing, drinking, night life and etc. Moreover, Shinjuku is the most popular area for tourists. Shinjuku is the best location to stay for a Tokyo trip with easy access to any area in Tokyo. Trains like JR lines and Tokyo METRO subway lines will take you literally anywhere.

In Shinjuku, there are;
・Kabuki-Cho – any kind of night life you can enjoy
・Shinjuku National Gyoen Park – Japanese traditonal style garden
・Isetan Department Store – shopping mall with luxury and latest fashion brand stores.
・Tokyo Metropolitan Government Office - Free observation deck at 202m high. You can see Mt.Fuji on sunny days.

----- For more details !!! -----
【Please have a look at the guidebook on my listing page to see my best recommended restaurants, bars and shops nearby the apartment.】

I'm sure you will love it and enjoy the stay in Tokyo.
host_about:
Hi everyone my name is Shinju.
 I love travelling and exploring new cultures.
Since I was a child I used to travel abroad to improve my English, I used to live in the U.K. where I became very passionate about Europe and its art and history, little by little I start travelling also around Asia and US.
I had the opportunity to get in touch with different people from all over the world, that’s why I have started hosting to keep getting in touch with many people from different countries!
I now work in Tokyo as an s/e of IT industry. I know this city pretty well, so I can suggest you many spots and things to do and enjoy of this city!
I hope you will have a wonderful holiday in my country and make incredible memories!

I'd love to introduce my host friends, Azuki and Maki and Hatsuko! They own apartments in Shinjuku and Shibuya area.
Take a look at their lovely rooms!

Shinju

name: Home in Adachi City · 4 bedrooms · 5 beds · 1 bath
description:
～家の特徴～
★最大9名まで宿泊可能
★広々87㎡
★西新井駅は日比谷線と半蔵門線が乗り入れているので上野まで約15分、銀座まで約30分、渋谷へも約45分と、乗り換えなしで行けます！

あの世界の北野武さんが生まれ育った街としても有名な足立区西新井。閑静な住宅エリアは駅前の賑やかなエリアと再開発の商業エリアの中間にあり、買い物やエンタメ、食事に随一の利便性で、長期滞在でも回り切れないほどのお店があります。
室内のインテリアは音にこだわっており、小さな音量でも家の中のどこにいても音楽を楽しめます。アレクサに音楽をかけてもらってもいいし、Bluetoothで自分のスマホから再生することもできます。
もう一つのこだわりはベッドです。長年研究して辿り着いた、最も快適な寝心地を生み出す二種類のマットレスの組み合わせがメインとなっていますので、極上の眠りをお楽しみ下さい。
階段部分には、座ってシュートが打てる本格的なバスケットゴールがあります。
厄除けとしても、武さんの母親のさきさんが団子握りのバイトをしていた、有名な西新井大師も近いですよ。
駐車場もありますので、akippaでご予約下さい。

The space
【ハウス設備】
★全室、都市ガスファンヒーターをエアコンに加えて完備しております。燃焼時に大量の水蒸気を発生しますので、空気が乾燥せず、のどを守るため、風邪をひきにくくなりますよ。まるで北欧の暖炉の家のような暖かさです。

-キングサイズ(シングルベッド2台分、2ｍ×2m)ベッド×2　
-ダブルベット× 1
-ソファーベット(マットレス仕様）× 3
-ソファー(3人掛け)× 1
-ソファー(1人掛け)× 5
-キッチン× 1　
-ダイニングテーブル
-椅子

-風呂場（トイレ別）
-固定wifi× 1
-ナイフ、まな板、カトラリー
-キッチン調理道具
-洗濯機

neighborhood_overview:
Our property is located in an excellent location for quietness in the middle of the bustling city. It perfectly integrates the prosperity of Tokyo's modern business and the quietness of classical culture. The cherry tree in front of the door has a history of more than 100 years. During the cherry blossom season, you can lie on the bed and enjoy the full The tree is blooming.

Bunkyo District is one of the 6 core districts in Tokyo's core 23 districts, along with Shinjuku, Shibuya, Chiyoda, Shinagawa, and Chuo District. It can be described as a prime location in the city center. This is the university town of Tokyo, and the famous Tokyo University is located here. The whole block is full of rich cultural atmosphere, and even the name of the street is called "Street of Knowledge".

The property is next to Yushima Tenmangu (Yujima Tenjin), just turn left when you go out. Yushima Tenjin is a super-effective shrine for studying in Tokyo. There are cherry blossom festiva

neighborhood_overview:
Ogikubo Station has all the daily goods you need and is the most comfortable place to stay for travelers! After about 5 minutes on foot from the station, there is a quiet residential area. There are 4 lines running at the station (JR Chuo Line, JR Sobu Line, Tokyo Metro Tozai Line, Tokyo Metro Marunouchi Line) so it has great access to popular areas in Tokyo like Shinjuku St., Akihabara St., Tokyo St. and so on!

Near the Station
24 hr super market, convenience store in front of the station
Several coffee shops at a 2 min walk distance from the station
Hot spring “Tokyo Ogikubo Tennen Onsen Nagomi no Yu” at a 1 min walk distance from station < (URL HIDDEN)
host_about:
Hi I'm Risa.
Thank you for visiting my page.

As for myself, my hobbies are playing sports(especially Golf and volleyball), watching sports(ice hockey), riding horses, and traveling.
Until now I've been to Australia, Canada, US, UK, Netherlands, Germany, Switzerland, Liechtenstein, Italy, Monaco, France, Peru, Bolivia, Korea, Taiwan and Malaysia. (hope I didn't miss any...)
I also enjoy traveling around Japan from northern Hokkaindo to southern Okinawa.
Let us know if you need some help with your destinations/activities while you stay here ;) 

Also, I would be more than happy to meet you in person and spend some time talking/eating/drinking with you if you would like. (I could invite my friends as well; the more the merrier...!)
Look forward to see you in Tokyo anyway ;)

name: Home in Taito City · ★4.40 · 1 bedroom · 10 beds · 1 shared bath
description:
MOMO HOUSEは2020年にオープンした「浅草の風情」と「上野の利便」が楽しめるゲストハウスです☆

浅草と上野の中間にあり、合羽橋のショッピングストリートまで徒歩２〜３分。浅草寺・隅田川・スカイツリー、御徒町、秋葉原も徒歩圏内。

移動に便利な上野駅から東京近郊・日本全国どこへでも♪　東京、恵比寿、六本木、渋谷、新宿、池袋、品川などの主要駅すべて乗り換えなし！　鎌倉、湘南、日光、東北などへの遠出も便利です。

浅草はアトラクションとエンターテイメントの宝庫。浅草寺、花やしき、演芸ホール（落語）、仲見世通り、人力車、水上バス、着物・サムライ・忍者体験、よりどりみどりの楽しいツアーなどなど。年間を通してイベント満載。三社祭、隅田川花火大会、ほおずき市、とうろう流し、サンバ祭り…いつも新しい発見のある街です。下町情緒をご満喫ください♪

ホストは南千住（山谷）、浅草で住み込みをしていたので、観光のことなど遠慮なく聞いてくださいね〜^^

＊　ドミトリー部屋でのベッド１台分料金です。プライバシーカーテンで自分だけのスペースを確保。ゆったりできる屋上やコモンルームもご利用ください！　＊

The space
寝室は、木のぬくもりのある２段ベッドが並ぶドミトリー。キッチン設備には自信があります！　小さいけれどくつろげる屋上あり。ブック・コーナーあり。コモンルームには「子ども文庫」を併設していますので、ぜひ覗いてみてください。

License number
M130027796
neighborhood_overview: １階のラテアートが素敵なカフェがハウスの目印。迷わず到着できること間違いなし。合羽（かっぱ）橋は近年、外国人観光客にも人気のスポットです。ハウスの目の前にあるお寺は通称「かっぱ寺」として知られています。また、浅草寺は徒歩圏内です。
host_about:
* Lived in the U.K. and Ireland for 2 years in total. Visited about 50 countries and areas in the world including the continent of Africa. Most of the places are seaports as they were stops of Peaceboat that is a cruise ship and takes voyages from Japan to Japan––a round world literally. Took Peaceboat twice, once as a passenger, and second time as a teacher for the school on the sea through the voyage.

Worked as a reception staff living in the site for 2 and a half years at a hotel for backpackers. Stayed in an Airbnb accommodation in Asakusa for 2 years, working as a staff in the house. For over a decade, the living places were always with other people such as shared houses! 

Because of experiences working as a Montessori teacher, international school teacher, nursery teacher and nanny…, will always welcome to meet children in MOMO HOUSE. 

* ｲｷﾞﾘｽとｱｲﾙﾗﾝﾄﾞにﾄｰﾀﾙ2年滞在｡ｱﾌﾘｶを含め約50か国訪問｡ﾋﾟｰｽﾎﾞｰﾄ’地球一周の船旅’で地球2周､鉄道で日本1周｡ﾎﾃﾙﾌﾛﾝﾄｽﾀｯﾌ2年半､民泊ﾍﾙﾊﾟｰ2年､いずれも住み込み｡ﾋﾟｰｽﾎﾞｰﾄ2周目は｢子どもの家(=船上幼稚園)｣の先生として乗船｡AMI国際ﾓﾝﾃｯｿｰﾘ教師資格および日本の保育士資格ﾎﾙﾀﾞｰ｡海外でﾍﾞﾋﾞｰｼｯﾀｰも経験｡

name: Rental unit in Itabashi City · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
お仕事や、お勉強用として、ゲーミングチェアや、昇降デスクをご用意。
さらに文房具も各種取り揃えております。

駅からは少し遠いけれど、その分、周辺の事を知るチャンスに巡り会えます。
自転車もご用意しておりますので、近場の商店街や川沿いなどへサイクリングでもいかがでしょうか？
また、帝京大学病院が近い為、病院にご用がある方などの宿泊にはピッタリです。

玄関内に防犯カメラを設置しておりますが、住居部分は映さないよう配慮をしております。

鍋やフライパンはご用意しておりますが、調味料などは管理ができない為、ご用意はありません。

冷蔵庫内のお水（ペットボトル）、ドリップパックのコーヒーなどはサービスですのでご自由にお飲み下さい。

自転車、バイクでお越しの方は、１０２号室のベランダ側、青い車の後ろ部分に無料で駐輪可能です。

The space
一般的なアパートの１室貸し切りとなります。
必要なものは揃っていますので、長期滞在も可能です。
洗濯機のご用意がないため、近くのコインランドリーをご利用ください。

Other things to note
●都営三田線、板橋区役所前駅から徒歩１０分程。
●JR埼京線、板橋駅から徒歩２３分程。板橋駅からはバスもでており、王子駅行きに乗り、帝京大学病院　下車。そこから７分程。
●JR埼京線、十条駅から徒歩１８分程。

host_about:
一人旅が好きで、日本中を旅しています。
沖縄でゲストハウスに宿泊した際に、ゲストハウスの経営も面白そうだなと思ったことがきっかけで、民泊を始めてみました。
自分自身コミュニケーションをとるのは苦手ですが、ご満足頂けるハウスにしていきたいと思っています。
この点が残念だったなど、忌憚のないご意見ご感想お待ちしております。

暮らしの最適化の追求
テクノロジーが全ての事象を最適化している２１世紀。メディア・エンタメ・食・健康・仕事、「ほぼ」全てが自分に合ったサービスで溢れるいま、一番大事な暮らしはどうだろうか？

僕たちはあなたに最適化された真のライフスタイルを提供したい。２１世紀最後のフロンティアである不動産、暮らしの最適化に挑んでいきます。

neighborhood_overview:
About Shinjuku
Shinjuku is one of the biggest cities in Tokyo. Great spot for shopping, sightseeing, drinking, night life and etc. Moreover, Shinjuku is the most popular area for tourists. Shinjuku is the best location to stay for a Tokyo trip with easy access to any area in Tokyo. Trains like JR lines and Tokyo METRO subway lines will take you literally anywhere.

In Shinjuku, there are;
・Kabuki-Cho – any kind of night life you can enjoy
・Shinjuku National Gyoen Park – Japanese traditonal style garden
・Isetan Department Store – shopping mall with luxury and latest fashion brand stores.
・Tokyo Metropolitan Government Office - Free observation deck at 202m high. You can see Mt.Fuji on sunny days.

I'm sure you will love it and enjoy the stay in Tokyo.
I would love to help you with ANYTHING before/during and even after your stay to make your trip an even more wonderful one.
If you need any further information, feel free to ask me! :)
host_about:
Hi, I'm Fumi! 
I'm a graduate of  University and working for an IT company in Shinjuku area. 
I do understand English since I spent a few years in LA.
 My English skill is not good enough though:( 
Japanese, English and Chinese are available so don't hesitate to contact me!
 I own a apartment in Shinjuku  area and located within walking distance from stations.
 I warmly welcome from a single traveler to a  family!! 

I'm starting from the smallest thing to be a better host. So feel free to let me know ANYTHING on your mind. I'd love to make your trip a wonderful one together!

neighborhood_overview:
The Tokyo Sky Tree is within a 10-minute walk.
By the Tokyo Sky tree, there is an aquarium, a planetarium along with many souvenir shops and restaurants.
From the Tokyo Sky Tree observatory you can overlook the city of Tokyo.

It takes about 10-15 minutes by train from Oshiage Station to Asakusa, Ueno and Ryogoku.
In Asakusa there are old Japanese towns, and in Ueno there are museums and zoos, and in the spring there are cherry blossoms.
At Ryogoku, there is a traditional Japanese sumo venue.

There are two 7-Eleven convenience stores nearby (each a 3-minute walk)
5 minute walk to the grocery store

host_about:
Hello everyone, I am Pang Yi Ling, a Chinese people who have been in Japan for more than 20 years. I engaged in public welfare activities in China.
 Rescue stray animals for about 15 years.
 Yiyi HOUSE West Shinjuku was built in 2011 with reinforced concrete and can resist magnitude 8 earthquake. In 2017,  Yiyi HOUSE West Shinjuku was designed by a Chinese dream transformer Mr Takafumi Honma, a Japanese designer and was reported by Oriental Television. More than 95% of the supplies in  Yiyi HOUSE West Shinjuku Hotel are from Nidali Furniture Sales Shop, a famous Japanese brand. Yiyi HOUSE West Shinjuku started its business on September 1st. We receive tourists from home and abroad with preferential prices and good environment. It can help provide convenience for visitors to Japan, make more friends and contribute their love to rescue more stray animals.

私は､東京新宿に住んでいる中国人です｡動物愛護と救護活動を15年以上続けております｡人生の目標は､世界中にいる様々な人々とお付き合いをしたいです｡

你们好,我是伊玲｡中国人,来日本20年以上｡在中国从事公益活动｡救助流浪动物15年左右｡伊伊HOUSE 西新宿在2011年建造,钢筋水泥,抗震8级｡2017年伊伊HOUSE 西新宿设计是中国梦想改造家(东方电视台报道的日本名设计师本间贵史先生设计｡

neighborhood_overview:
About Shinjuku
Shinjuku is one of the biggest cities in Tokyo. Great spot for shopping, sightseeing, drinking, night life and etc. Moreover, Shinjuku is the most popular area for tourists. Shinjuku is the best location to stay for a Tokyo trip with easy access to any area in Tokyo. Trains like JR lines and Tokyo METRO subway lines will take you literally anywhere.

In Shinjuku, there are;
・Kabuki-Cho – any kind of night life you can enjoy
・Shinjuku National Gyoen Park – Japanese traditonal style garden
・Isetan Department Store – shopping mall with luxury and latest fashion brand stores.
・Tokyo Metropolitan Government Office - Free observation deck at 202m high. You can see Mt. Fuji on sunny days.

host_about:
こんにちは、The Breathing Hotel Tokyo です

当ホテルは、多数の法人様のご利用実績もございます全185室の大型ホテルです。運営会社は、airbnb公式パートナーにも選ばれておりますので、安心してご利用ください。

＜コンセプト＞
駅の雑踏から離れた閑静な場所。
旅の疲れ、仕事の疲れ、息が詰まるようなことも多いけど、
ここに泊まるとなんだか心が元気になって、
次の日の朝、深呼吸して「今日も１日がんばろう。」と思える。
いつもより足取りが軽くなる。

呼吸する喜びを感じるホテル
呼吸することのように、いつも身近にあるホテル
The Breathing Hotel Tokyoで
生き生きとした１日のはじまりをお迎えください。



Hello, this is The Breathing Hotel Tokyo

Our hotel is a large hotel with 185 rooms, which has been used by many corporations. 
The operating company is also selected as an official partner of airbnb, so please feel free to make the reservation. 

＜Concept＞
A quiet place away from the crowds at the station.
I often get tired of traveling, tired of work, and suffocated,
Sometimes I feel tired from traveling, I feel tired from work, and I am suffocated, 
but staying here makes my heart feel better, and on the next morning, 
take a deep breath and say, "I'll do my best today." I think.
And the gait becomes lighter than usual.

A hotel where you can feel the joy of breathing
A hotel that is always close to you, like breathing
Please welcome the beginning of a wonderful day at The Breathing Hotel Tokyo.

description:

●３階 ・個室

カギが掛かります。
ご夫婦や、小さなお子様がいるお客様、一人様でご宿泊されたい方向けです。



※東京スカイツリーから1.7km。両国国技館2.3km。最寄りの羽田空港まで27kmの立地です。

The space
2015年の春、自転車で日本一周に出発。海岸沿いを沖縄、北海道まで一筆書きで制覇。

一年半。19,000km。その長旅で受け続けた恩恵を返すべく、旅する側から迎える側に…そんな想いで、作った温かいゲストハウスです。

皆さんにお会いできるのを楽しみにしています。



錦糸町やスカイツリー付近で安宿をお探しの方、

またホテルじゃなく日本の住宅で寝泊まりしてみたい方、

ぜひ GUEST HOUSE SaKURa に泊まりに来てください^^

１階の CAFÉ & BAR が目印！

GUEST HOUSE SaKURa は、

錦糸町駅から歩いて12分、

人数が多い時や、重たい荷物があるときは、

タクシーで５分、繁華街からは少し離れているけど、

東京の下町を感じられる、住宅街にあります。

何と言っても、スカイツリーと東京の街並みが見えて、
neighborhood_overview:

100m以内に（中華料理屋。そば屋。ステーキ屋。すし屋。居酒屋。カラオケスナック。）あり！

スカイツリーまでは信号も無い、緑豊かな公園内を歩いて行けますのでストレス無くたどり着けます。

neighborhood_overview:
Oyama station (3min walk) : On your way to the house from here you will see lots of bars and restaurants! You won't even feel the distance with the amount of things you will pass by here ^^
　　→Main train line you will be using is the Tobu Tojo Line. With this line you can head straight to Ikebukuro station.

【About Ikebukuro】

Ikebukuro is one of the biggest and most popular districts along with Shinjuku and Shibuya.
Once you wander nearby Ikebukuro station, you can find various selections of shops and restaurants.
Very popular among young people you will find bar, Izakaya type restaurants, bowling, baseball center (on rooftops!), shopping malls, anime, manga-related stores, theme cafes and a lot more.

Also if you are interested in Japanese Anime culture, Ikebukuro is one of Tokyo's district that you have to visit.
One day is definitely not long enough to enjoy this city!

host_about:
Hello there!

I'm Kazumi.
Tokyo is a very exciting city, but it also has some good old townscapes, and there are new discoveries every day.
There are delicious restaurants, cafes with lots of greenery, places where you can interact with animals, stores where you can buy unique things...
Tokyo is evolving every day. There is sure to be a place for you to enjoy.

Through Airbnb, I hope to make you fall in love with Japan.
The rooms I have available are as comfortable as possible so that you can have the experience of living in Tokyo.
The rooms may be made differently from those in your country. You may find it inconvenient.
But please try to enjoy the differences!
I am sensitive to your troubles and can help you.
You don't have to feel anxious. Please feel free to contact me at any time before making an appointment.
I would love to talk to you guys :)

I like to watch soccer and go to the gym to work out.
At home, I play a game called Fortnite on my switch.
I'd love to know what you like to do too!

こんにちは！
私はｶｽﾞﾐといいます。よろしくお願いします！

ご予約前にでもお気軽にご連絡くださいね。質問もいつでも受け付けています+.(*’`*)ﾟ+

host_about:
優雅yugaです､私も多くのお客様と同じように､旅行が大好きです､知らない国に行って､違う文化や､景色に触れながら､色んな事を学んだり､体験する事が趣味です!どこの国もあまり差がないようなﾎﾃﾙに泊まるより､民家に泊まって､その国の人と接したいなと､ずっとそう思ってました!その思いから､私も日本に来るお客様が､私の民泊に泊まって欲しいなと思いました､泊まるだけの民宿ではなく､快適に､自由に､又民宿とは思えないぐらい､高級設備､日常用品が､たくさん揃ってます､ﾎﾃﾙでは味わえない楽しさ､日本人の生活ｽﾀｲﾙを身近で体験しながら､思い出が残る旅になったら､嬉しいねと思ってます! 

是非YUGAの家に泊まって見てください!
困った事があれば､何でも聞いてください､精一杯ｻﾎﾟｰﾄします^_^
予約お待ちしております^_^

About Shinjuku
Shinjuku is one of the biggest cities in Tokyo. Great spot for shopping, sightseeing, drinking, night life and etc. Moreover, Shinjuku is the most popular area for tourists. Shinjuku is the best location to stay for a Tokyo trip with easy access to any area in Tokyo. Trains like JR lines and Tokyo METRO subway lines will take you literally anywhere.

In Shinjuku, there are;
・Kabuki-Cho – any kind of night life you can enjoy
・Shinjuku National Gyoen Park – Japanese traditonal style garden
・Isetan Department Store – shopping mall with luxury and latest fashion brand stores.
・Tokyo Metropolitan Government Office - Free observation deck at 202m high. You can see Mt. Fuji on sunny days.

host_about:
Hi I'm Risa.
Thank you for visiting my page.

As for myself, my hobbies are playing sports(especially Golf and volleyball), watching sports(ice hockey), riding horses, and traveling.
Until now I've been to Australia, Canada, US, UK, Netherlands, Germany, Switzerland, Liechtenstein, Italy, Monaco, France, Peru, Bolivia, Korea, Taiwan and Malaysia. (hope I didn't miss any...)
I also enjoy traveling around Japan from northern Hokkaindo to southern Okinawa.
Let us know if you need some help with your destinations/activities while you stay here ;) 

Also, I would be more than happy to meet you in person and spend some time talking/eating/drinking with you if you would like. (I could invite my friends as well; the more the merrier...!)
Look forward to see you in Tokyo anyway ;)

description:
A newly modern room which can accommodate up to 8 people, is located in Ryogoku. Ryogoku is Japanese old-fashion area filled with the emotions of the Edo period. Museums, shrines, monuments, museums, sumo rooms ... it is a treasure house of tourist attractions! The origin of sumo which is Japanese national sport is traced back to here, in Ryogoku. If you take trains, you can easily access to Asakusa around 10 mins. It's also convenient for you to reach major cities in Tokyo. Enjoy your trip :)

The space
A newly renovated room is well-equipped which is perfect for your long-stay.
――――――――――――――――――――――――

- 4 double beds; comfortable & even big enough for 2 adults each!

neighborhood_overview:
Edo was one of the biggest cities in the world. Ryogoku is a district famous for its connection with the Japanese national sport of sumo. The people of Edo used to flock to Ryogoku, which is also the birthplace of Edo-style sushi. Also there are museums, shrines, monuments, museums, etc...a treasure house of tourist attractions! I'm sure that you totally enjoy what is good about Japan!
―――――――――――――――――――――――――――
★江戸NOREN (Edo-NOREN)
Edo NOREN brings together 12 shops specializing in food such as traditional Edo-style sushi, the authentic chanko-nabe stew eaten by sumo wrestlers, soba (buckwheat noodles), and tempura! But it's not just about food. Many Edo-related events are also held here. Edo NOREN can be accessed directly via the JR Ryogoku Station West Exit.

★両国国技館 (Ryogoku Kokugikan)
Also known as Ryogoku Sumo Hall, is an indoor sporting arena. It is the third building built in Tokyo associated with the name Kokugikan. The current building was opened

ホストのTakeshiです。ホストは2015年頃から始めて、今は東京の江東区、台東区、墨田区という東側のエリアを中心にいくつかの部屋の管理をしています。

第一印象は怖いとか何を考えてるかわからないとか言われますが、これでも頑張って楽しそうにしているつもりです。

元々はサラリーマンで、デザインの仕事をしていましたので、全てではありませんが、デザインにこだわった部屋が多いと思います。

今は、オーストラリアにワーホリに行った経験から、英語の学習や話すことが好きになり、英語を学ぶシェアハウス「Y2 English House」や、Airbnbのホストをしています。

他には、中野でコワーキングスペース「FromScratch Works」を運営したり、2021年3月からは民泊のホスト様向けのオンラインサロン「minka」の共同運営も始めました。
民泊を始めたい方や、ホストの悩みや情報共有をしています。
※民泊ホストに興味がある方は、是非「minka」「オンラインサロン」で検索してみてください。


I manage this guest house with my friend Shigeo and Yoshimi.

My introduction
I like to talk to people from different countries. 

I'm a designer and also an owner of the shared house where people study English.

My purpose for doing B&B is to make people from other countries happy and to have them enjoyed the best staying in Japan.

I'd like people to know not only one side of Japan ( ex. Asakusa, Shibuya, Akihabara ), but also the other side ( local food , culture , people ).

While I'm introducing Japan to foreigners, I'd also like to have Japanese people experienced talking and hanging out with them.
People from my shared house are willing to spend time with travelers.

I like eating, drinking, reading and bourldering.


************************************************
Shigeo Kojima

Hello,
I like to introduce Japanese usual cultures.
I have a lot of wonderful friends any places in a world.
I'm a watchmaker for Swiss watch brand in Tokyo.
I like traveling, taking photos and go out drinking with my friends.

neighborhood_overview: Ueno  is a district in Tokyo's Taitō Ward, best known as the home of Ueno Park. Ueno is also home to some of Tokyo's finest cultural sites, including the Tokyo National Museum, the National Museum of Western Art, and the National Museum of Nature and Science, as well as a major public concert hall. The Kan'ei-ji, a major temple of the Tokugawa shōguns, stood in this area, and its pagoda is now within the grounds of the Ueno Zoo. Nearby is the Ueno Tōshō-gū, a Shinto shrine dedicated to Tokugawa Ieyasu. Near the Tokyo National Museum there is The International Library of Children's Literature. Just south of the station is the Ameya-yokochō, a street market district that evolved out of an open-air black market that sprung up after World War II. Just east is the Ueno motorcycle district, with English-speaking staff available in some stores.

neighborhood_overview:
Sumida Ward (墨田区, sumida-ku) lies east of central Tokyo. It is home to a famous cherry blossom viewing area (along the Sumida River near Asakusa Station) in spring, the Sumida River Fireworks Festival (Hanabi Matsuri) in summer, and Tokyo's main sumo stadium (Ryogoku Kokugikan) where tournaments are held three times a year. It is also home to the Tokyo SkyTree, the world's tallest self-supporting tower.

The area is considered "shitamachi" (roughly translated as "old town"), though it has become a kind of bedroom community for Tokyoites, which has meant the building of many high-rise apartment buildings.

neighborhood_overview: Ueno  is a district in Tokyo's Taitō Ward, best known as the home of Ueno Park. Ueno is also home to some of Tokyo's finest cultural sites, including the Tokyo National Museum, the National Museum of Western Art, and the National Museum of Nature and Science, as well as a major public concert hall. The Kan'ei-ji, a major temple of the Tokugawa shōguns, stood in this area, and its pagoda is now within the grounds of the Ueno Zoo. Nearby is the Ueno Tōshō-gū, a Shinto shrine dedicated to Tokugawa Ieyasu. Near the Tokyo National Museum there is The International Library of Children's Literature. Just south of the station is the Ameya-yokochō, a street market district that evolved out of an open-air black market that sprung up after World War II. Just east is the Ueno motorcycle district, with English-speaking staff available in some stores.

neighborhood_overview:
About Shinjuku
Shinjuku is one of the biggest cities in Tokyo. Great spot for shopping, sightseeing, drinking, night life and etc. Moreover, Shinjuku is the most popular area for tourists. Shinjuku is the best location to stay for a Tokyo trip with easy access to any area in Tokyo. Trains like JR lines and Tokyo METRO subway lines will take you literally anywhere.

In Shinjuku, there are;
・Kabuki-Cho – any kind of night life you can enjoy
・Shinjuku National Gyoen Park – Japanese traditonal style garden
・Isetan Department Store – shopping mall with luxury and latest fashion brand stores.
・Tokyo Metropolitan Government Office - Free observation deck at 202m high. You can see Mt. Fuji on sunny days.

neighborhood_overview:
As the capital of Japan, Tokyo is the center of Japanese politics, culture and economy. If you want to experience the charm of Japan from various angles, sightseeing in Tokyo is the best choice.
Tokyo not only has many places of interest representing Japanese history and culture, but also incorporates culture and fashion from all over the world. It is also a gourmet base that brings together cuisines from all over the world. In addition to enjoying the latest fashions, special cuisines from various countries, colorful theme parks and scenic spots full of Edo tradition, you can also fully experience Japan's unique otaku culture in Akihabara, the holy land of animation and games. There are many indoor attractions in Tokyo, so you can enjoy sightseeing regardless of the weather regardless of the time of your visit.

neighborhood_overview: My apartment is located in Ginza, Tokyo. Ginza was built in the ruins of the Silver Coin Castings of the Edo Period (1603-1867), and has an elegant atmosphere and historical style that cannot be felt in any other neighborhood. The main road of Ginza Avenue is lined with old-fashioned department stores. Quality service and high-end goods sold in the store complement each other, which attracts many people to come for shopping. In the alleys of Ginza, you not only can enjoy shopping in the fashion stores, but also have the opportunity to sip a small tavern with a small taste. Ginza, which is advancing with the times, is not satisfied with the existing popularity, but exhibits the modernity and vitality rich in cultural heritage, as well as the charm of the ancient and beautiful times. Concentrating on famous Japanese department stores, traditional old shops and high-end luxury goods, it is known as the "heart of Tokyo". Ginza in Tokyo and the Champs Elysées in Paris and Fifth Avenue in Ne

neighborhood_overview:
Otsuka station is near to Ikebukuro station, on Tokyo’s busy JR Yamanote line. Conveniently located a few minutes from the metropolis’ bustling business, shopping and entertainment hubs, Otsuka is its own relaxed version of Tokyo.

The station itself is not too big. However, the area is bustling with people every August when more than 1,000 dancers participate in the Awa Odori dance festival. Other than that, the station area is a respite to those who are hanging out in Ikebukuro.

If you’re looking for a change of pace from the hyperactivity of Tokyo, this area is for you. Otsuka has the nostalgic feeling of downtown Edo (old Tokyo). Tucked within its back streets are small shopping arcades and old izakaya. One local bar to try is Edoichi, for some sashimi and (mostly) warm nihonshu (rice wine.)

A local Buddhist temple about a five-minute walk from the station fits right in with the nostalgic atmosphere. Built in the 1600s, Gokoku-ji is famous for being

TOKYO E JOY INN西新宿店坐落在历史悠久的川岛商店街上，满满的日本风情，是众多日本电影电视剧的取景地，交通便利。房源位于丸之內線中野新橋站步行7分鐘，距离西新宿五丁目巴士车站步行3分鐘可到达。除了便捷的交通，周边还有丰富多样的设施供您选择，房源不远处便是松岛市场、再往前走便有咖啡厅，各种融合菜餐厅、藥妝店，还有24小时营业的便利店。本店采用自助入住方式，让您可以根据您的行程安排，灵活选择入住时间，高效且私密的办理入住，避免深夜入住无人接待的尴尬。无论您是商务旅行还是休闲度假，我们期待能为您提供一个舒适、便利的住宿环境，让您的旅程更加愉快难忘。

host_about:
"Manpaku"

This isn’t something done in passing,
a side-hobby in one’s free time, or something
done to kill time.Instead, it’s an overnight manga
experience planned intentionally for the sole
purpose of soaking in the world of manga.

Even if you have chores to do, you reach for
book after book, absorbed in reading.
This comfortable feeling of defeat for manga.

Probably everybody has felt this before.
And you can find it here.

You’re in trouble if you discover a good series.
Be drawn into the wonderful world of manga.

Now, let’s lose ourselves to the irresistible
power of manga tonight.

A sleepless, indulgent night

MANGA ART HOTEL, TOKYO

Airbnbマップの位置が不正確であるため、ナビゲーションにAirbnbマップを使用しないでください。

The space
1）法律の定めにより宿泊確定後、宿泊者全員のパスポートの提示・お名前・ご住所・ご職業の開示を求めます。開示をされない場合、チェックインの案内もしくは宿泊自体を拒否する場合もございます。ご了承のほど何卒よろしくお願いいたします。

・特に夜は騒音にご注意下さい。
4）宿泊者以外の方をお部屋に招待しないで下さい。

ごみはまとめて下さい。
6）室内の物を壊してしまった場合、すぐに連絡下さい。悪質な損害につきましては、損害賠償を請求させていただく場合があります。

Hi I'm Risa.
Thank you for visiting my page.

As for myself, my hobbies are playing sports(especially Golf and volleyball), watching sports(ice hockey), riding horses, and traveling.

Look forward to see you in Tokyo anyway ;)

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood where this listing is located retains the original features of Japan's economic center since ancient times, and is not far from the bustling commercial district. It takes about 10 minutes to Akihabara Business District . You can experience the vitality of the animation world and the famous maid cafe and pet cafe.

The neighborhood Nihonbashi Area has a history of more than 400 years. It was first built during the Tokugawa Ieyasu in 1603 and has been the center of the economy since the Edo period. [Fish River Bank] on the northeast side of Nihonbashi, benefiting from the rich water resources of Nihonbashi River, has gathered a wide variety of fish from various places and has become a famous seafood trading market. There has been a huge trade volume since ancient times. Now we see a lot of Japanese restaurants still use [fish river bank] as the shop name, and that is where the allusions come from.
host_about: Welcome to my fantastic house. I love traveling and also love to make friends. I carefully prepared and decorated my house for you. Wish you have a nice trip in Tokyo.

host_about:
世界的に大流行している新型コロナ原因で観光業や飲食店など、苦しい日々を送っている人達は大勢いらっしゃる中、苦境から脱出するように頑張っている姿も大勢います。
　　これから、コロナ禍を負けずに、光り道に歩み始まっているところで、今後の観光業の復活に些細な貢献したいと想います。
　　中国語には「否极泰来」と言う諺があった、「悪運がその極に達すれば幸運が来る」と言う意味です。これから短い内に平凡な生活に戻れられると信じております。

　　　株式会社　三源　社長　ニンガツキ
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　2021  旧正月

name: Rental unit in Toshima City · ★4.33 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 2 shared baths
description:
2019年10月完成！大人気の地震に強いパナソニック鉄骨マンションで安心安全です。
共有部分は衛生的な台所、最新のIHコンロ、電子レンジ2台、電気ケトル2台、炊飯器、フライパン&鍋などの調理器具や調味料と大量の食器が用意されています。
広いシャワールームが2か所、シャワートイレが3か所、コイン式の洗濯機3台、乾燥機3台、格安100円ドリンク自販機、3D撮影機（プリクラ機能付き）、写真現像器機1000円で20枚（KGサイズ）、布団、ズボンプレス機・アイロン・掃除機も完備しています。
広い屋上50㎡を開放中です。晴れた日には、富士山が美しく見れます。夜景もきれいです。屋上でパターゴルフの練習や天体望遠鏡で星の観察も可能です。
屋上には双眼観光望遠鏡、プール（夏季限定）を設置しています。
月額割引あります。安くて便利です。

The space
お部屋は2段ベットです。漫画「ワンピース」の大きな絵が壁の一面に描かれています。部屋毎に壁紙が違います。マンション全体で50種類以上の壁紙が使用されています。また、各部屋、コンセプト毎の部屋創りになってます。この部屋には、専用の洗面台・ドライヤー・冷蔵庫・エアコン・テーブル・椅子がセットされています。屋上は宿泊者が自由に出入りできます。富士山が見える素敵な場所です。
屋上には双眼観光望遠鏡、プール（夏季限定）を設置しています。

Guest access
マンションの入り口は、暗証番号方式のオートロックで入ります。
1階のシェアハウスは、暗証番号方式の鍵ロッカーから2本鍵を受け取り、シェアハウス玄関キーにて開けて、個室の鍵を開けて自分の部屋に入室します。
女性も安心のトリプルキーを採用しています。

During your stay
ホストは仕事を毎日していますので、お掃除の時に会うかもしれません。
ホストは、この施設に住んでいます。

Other things to note
静かな場所です。夜は静かに過ごしてください。

host_about:
Hello~
It is jung of Jjhaus.
It has been 7 years since I became a Tokyo citizen .
In our apartment where our couple started a newly-married life to Tokyo
I'm happy to have started meeting people who came to the trip.
Travel is always fresh, I think it is like a good friend.
Our couple who likes to travel also often travels to new places and familiar sites every year.
It is a jj house that began in time.
One newly-married room often visits Tokyo in many countries, increasing the number of jjhaus's rooms, so it was decided to lightly write such a greeting.
In order for us to continue good relationships in the future,
It still remains in the space you want to stay.

안녕하세요~
JJ House의 장용환, 정수연입니다.
어느덧 도쿄시민이 된지 10년째, 저희부부가 신혼생활을 시작했던 아파트에서 
도쿄를 여행하게된 여러분과의 만남을 시작하게 되어 기쁩니다.
여행이란 늘 새로움을 주는 친구같은 존재인거 같습니다.
여행을좋아하는 저희부부도 매년 새로운곳으로 또 어쩌면 익숙한곳으로 여행을 자주 떠납니다.
그러면서 조금씩 시작하게된 JJ House입니다.
신혼집 방 한개로 시작한 아파트에 여러나라에서 자주 도쿄를 찾는 친구들이 JJ House를 다시 찾아주면서 방을 늘리게되었고 이런 인삿말까지 적게 되었습니다.
앞으로도 좋은 인연들이 계속 지속되길바랍니다.
도쿄에 놀러오신 여러분이 또 머물고 싶은 공간으로 남아있겠습니다. 

こんにちは〜
Jjhausのjungです｡
もう東京市民になって7年目になりました｡
私たち夫婦が新婚生活を始めたｱﾊﾟｰﾄで東京へ
旅行に来た皆さんとの出会いを始めることになって嬉しいです｡
旅行というのはいつも新しさを感じられ,良い友達のような存在だと思います｡
まだ会いたい友達のような､､
旅行が好きな私たち夫婦も､毎年新しい場所にまた慣れた所へ旅行を良く行きます｡
そのうちに始まったjjﾊｳｽです｡
新婚生活をした一つの部屋が多くの国でよく東京を訪問してくれる友人が多くなりjjhausの部屋を増やすことになり､このような挨拶まで軽く書くことになりました｡
今後も良い縁が続けて行くように,
まだ泊まりたい空間に残ります｡

name: Rental unit in Toshima City · ★4.60 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
★大塚站南口徒步5分钟，全家便利店步行2分钟,超市步行4分钟。离池袋仅一站,如果不介意的话走路15到20分钟也可以到达。池袋为繁华的商业及休闲区域,您可在此找到Big Camera, MUJI, Harbs,一兰拉面,无敌家,动漫圣地Animate及许多餐厅及百货公司｡池袋太阳城内还有著名的空中水族馆,适合全家同乐｡

★从大塚站可直达池袋站，新宿站，上野站，东京站，秋叶原站，涉谷站，新大久保站等等超人气景点，都不用转车可以直达｡不需要担心因为语言方面的问题错过目的地｡

★房子是属于客厅卧室分离结构，客厅配有厨房的人气家庭公寓。共有2张双人床跟1张单人床1日式加床，最大可入住7人，适合团体或者亲朋戚友居住。

★公寓内配备了一切您日常所需的用品如微波炉，热水壶，冰箱，煤气灶及可使用的炊具和餐具。对于喜爱烹饪的客人来说可以去我家附近的超市购买当地的食材烹饪各式料理,想必旅途中的DIY烹饪会为您的入住增添几分色彩｡

★浴室只有淋浴，洗衣机以及先进的换气系统。我们也提供您洗发水，护发素，沐浴露，毛巾，洗衣水等免去您出行前因为洗簌用品占用行李空间的烦恼。

The space
公寓位于安静的住宅区，靠近主要的旅游目的地和购物场所，如池袋、秋叶原、新宿、东京站、银座和新宿。

房间是新建的一栋公寓，在1楼。采用自然温馨的装修风格，大窗户，采光好，窗帘遮光防火，让您可以舒适入住。房间内部所有的配置，小到内部装饰都是从客人的角度出发，让您在入住期间可以轻松愉快。每层一户，所以不管您入住哪一层，您都可以享受私密的空间。

★卧室★
1张标准双人床（140cm x 200cm）
2张单人床（120cm x 200cm）
日式床垫（100cm x 200cm）
6双布拖鞋

★设备和设施★
固定Wi-Fi, 洗衣机（在室内）、吸尘器（在室内）、电视、空调（每间房）

★厨房★独立拥有
锅、盘子、碗、切菜板、菜刀、微波炉、冰箱、电水壶
(厨房没有准备调味料，如需，附近超市或便利店有卖。）
★洗手间★独立拥

This house has been renovated recently in a modern style traditional Japanese style with its Japanese style living room for example.
Nevertheless, it is in the same time modern and well equipped to make your stay confortable and enjoyable.

Only 7 minutes to Asakusa, the house is located 2 minutes away from Yahiro station.
It is a 2 stories house that can host up to 12 people with 2 bedroom equipped with 5 double beds.

neighborhood_overview:
This house is only 2 minutes away walking from Yahiro station.
This location offers a great access to the rest of Tokyo and especially to Asakusa (7 minutes in train).


【About Asakusa】

Asakusa is one of the most touristic area in Tokyo, well known for its buddhist amazing temple named Sensoji, and its Nakamise, which is the name of a long shopping street full of gift shops leading to the temple itself.
We obviously can not talk about Sensoji without talking about Kaminarimon (the thunder gate), a big red gate built it traditional style where tourists line up to take a picture.
You can also take look at the area and discover its main spots by getting around with a rickshaw.
In other words it is the perfect place to discover or re-discover Tokyo's traditional face and explore a spiritual place where I am sure, you will make a lot of unforgettable memories!

It is an 8-minute walk from Takadanobaba Station and a 5-minute train ride to Shinjuku Ikebukuro.
There are convenience stores, supermarkets, countless taverns, ramen shops, and cafes nearby.

neighborhood_overview:
About Takadanobaba
There are tons of restaurants and shops within a 10-minute walk, and it is famous as a student district including Waseda University. The Kanda River flows nearby and it is a lively and safe area that is easy to spend.

About Shinjuku
Shinjuku is one of the biggest cities in Tokyo. Great spot for shopping, sightseeing, drinking, night life and etc. Moreover, Shinjuku is the most popular area for tourists. Shinjuku is the best location to stay for a Tokyo trip with easy access to any area in Tokyo. Trains like JR lines and Tokyo METRO subway lines will take you literally anywhere.

In Shinjuku, there are;
･Kabuki-Cho – any kind of night life you can enjoy
･Shinjuku National Gyoen Park – Japanese traditonal style garden

host_about:
Hello. My name is Keisuke.
I am 26 years old, studied at Waseda University in Tokyo.
I spent my high school days in Australia and New Zealand.
When I think back the past, this was a life changing event for me. I stayed at some hosts' places and I had a warm welcome from them.
And I thought that time I would love to host travelers from all over the world. 

I, myself like to travel like you all do.
In (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , I went to Hong Kong, Singapore, Taiwan and Thailand.
And last year, I visited France, Germany, Switzerland and Italy.
Hopefully I will visit other beautiful places this year.
I might stay with some of you when I go visit your place :)

I'm not a perfect host but I'm trying to be perfect!
Any kind of feedback is really appreciated.
Let me make your trip a wonderful one.

Hope you have a wonderful time here!
Thank you,
Keisuke

host_about:
大家好, 我們是一群熱愛日本住宅的文創工作者｡

因為想要推廣日本老屋文化, 與東京當地社區居民結合 請他們提供自家房屋為平台, 同心打造出一個旅遊的文創產業｡

房間樣式五花八門, 每個房源來自於不同的房東｡ 有些是1990泡沫時代從地方上京打拼者覓得的一隅蝸居之地, 有的是充滿回憶的三代同堂平屋一戶建 , 我們將這類40年以上的木造宅進行老屋翻新｡
這些空置的房源經過重新包裝 , 提供旅客一個舒適的環境供短暫住宿使用,   希望讓每位旅人透過這些我們精心佈置的溫馨小房間, 更加了解日本文化｡

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located near the Shiba Park and Tokyo Tower in central Tokyo.
Shiba Park is one of the oldest parks in Tokyo, just like Ueno Park. It has wide grassland, shaded trees and children's facilities, a good place for adults to relax and for children to enjoy. the Tokyo Tower on the west side of the park is one of the must-see attractions for tourists; The magnificent temple in the park is also popular as one of the spiritual temples of the Edo government of the famous Tokugawa family. Other famous spots such as Roppongi, Azabu Shiban, Shigiyagiya and Mita shopping streets are also nearby.

neighborhood_overview: Ueno  is a district in Tokyo's Taitō Ward, best known as the home of Ueno Park. Ueno is also home to some of Tokyo's finest cultural sites, including the Tokyo National Museum, the National Museum of Western Art, and the National Museum of Nature and Science, as well as a major public concert hall. The Kan'ei-ji, a major temple of the Tokugawa shōguns, stood in this area, and its pagoda is now within the grounds of the Ueno Zoo. Nearby is the Ueno Tōshō-gū, a Shinto shrine dedicated to Tokugawa Ieyasu. Near the Tokyo National Museum there is The International Library of Children's Literature. Just south of the station is the Ameya-yokochō, a street market district that evolved out of an open-air black market that sprung up after World War II. Just east is the Ueno motorcycle district, with English-speaking staff available in some stores.

neighborhood_overview:
As the capital of Japan, Tokyo is the center of Japanese politics, culture and economy. If you want to experience the charm of Japan from various angles, sightseeing in Tokyo is the best choice.
Tokyo not only has many places of interest representing Japanese history and culture, but also incorporates culture and fashion from all over the world. It is also a gourmet base that brings together cuisines from all over the world. In addition to enjoying the latest fashions, special cuisines from various countries, colorful theme parks and scenic spots full of Edo tradition, you can also fully experience Japan's unique otaku culture in Akihabara, the holy land of animation and games. There are many indoor attractions in Tokyo, so you can enjoy sightseeing regardless of the weather regardless of the time of your visit.

It is also very convenient for visitors, who come and go to Narita and Haneda airports. There is a shuttle bus from the airport to Tokyo Station and this way ,currently, is the most comfortable, cheapest and fastest route. We are located just 15 minutes walk from Tokyo Station .

ようこそUI Home Companyへ｡ﾍﾟｰｼﾞをご覧いただきありがとうございます｡私たちは東京都心部に多数のｹﾞｽﾄﾊｳｽを設立し､運営をしております｡私たちはより良いｻｰﾋﾞｽを提供する為､全てのｹﾞｽﾄﾊｳｽを改築しました｡日本国が指定する営業法をﾎﾃﾙ同様の基準でｸﾘｱし､皆様に安心して施設をご利用頂けるような空間に設計しております｡ｾｷｭﾘﾃｨｰの確保､衛生面の保証､ｱﾒﾆﾃｨｰの向上､周辺施設､観光ｽﾎﾟｯﾄのご案内､ﾄﾗﾌﾞﾙ対応など､全ての項目をｸﾞﾚｰﾄﾞｱｯﾌﾟし責任を持ってお客様をおもてなすことをお約束します｡是非ご安心して､UI Home companyのｹﾞｽﾄﾊｳｽにて安心して快適な旅行をお過ごしください｡

Welcome to our page. Thank you for visiting our profile. : )
We own a few houses in Tokyo to host you during your stay in the capital. We will do our best in order to provide you the best service possible.
We comply with Japan legislation to offer to our customers, a legal, safe, renovated and cosy place for their stay. 
We would do our best to help you create the best memories possible of your stay in Tokyo by helping you with transportation to Tokyo's best sightseeing spots, help with eventual trouble that you may meet, or make you suggestions for your stay.

name: Home in Koganei · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
description:
静かな住宅地にある小さな一軒家の3畳のお部屋を用意しました。
家族や友人が来た時のように、気さくにお迎えします。
使い捨てのものはできるだけ減らして、未来へ繋ぐことを考えながら、とはいっても柔軟にバランスよく工夫をしながら暮らしております。ゲストの方とアイディアをシェアできたら嬉しいです。
I propose a 3-tatami private Japanese style room in a small house in a quiet residential area.
I would like to welcome my guests as a friend and a family member.
I have an eco-friendly lifestyle. I try to recycle my garbage and to minimize disposable items as much as possible. I would be happy to discuss and share stories with my guests.

The space
The 3-tatami mat room is on the second floor, on the left of the stairs. My room is on the right. The toilet, bathroom, and kitchen are on the first floor. There is also a small garden.

階段を上がって左手の3畳があなたのお部屋で、右手側が私の部屋です。

Guest access
Except for our private rooms on the second floor, we share the space on the first floor.
For consecutive nights, I will enter the guest room for cleaning.

お互いの部屋以外は、立ち入
neighborhood_overview:
Koganei, Tokyo, Japan
It is a quiet neighborhood with many parks and green areas at walking distances from the house, such as Kushino Park, Kuriyama Park, Koganei Park, where locals and families often go to rest, walk and play. There also is a very nice path to walk along the Nogawa river leading to the Nogawa Park.
If you like walking or cycling, you can reach the Tama Lake through a beautiful walking/cycling road with many places to rest on the way.
Koganei is a charming town with many cafes, specialty coffee shops, restaurants and shops.

家の周りには、気分転換やリラックスに最適な緑がたくさん。
徒歩圏内に、、、
・ちょっと一息、梶野公園・栗山公園
・朝から活発な小金井公園
・川沿いを散歩、野川公園
・どこまでも歩けそうなら、ゴールは多摩湖
散歩の途中の休憩場所に・・・♪
カフェや自家焙煎のコーヒースタンド、個人店が多いいのも魅力的な町。
host_about:
I like to travel and to look for interesting places where to stay, while walking around the city enjoying the architecture of buildings and the historical landmarks, looking for local shops and restaurants with homemade meals, learning about local stories and dialects. Motivated by such experiences, I decided to start hosting travelers wishing to help them by providing an accommodation and the opportunity to discover non-touristic places and lifestyle of the locals.

host_about:
こんにちは
｢泊まれるｼｱﾀｰ｣TheaterZzz(ｼｱﾀｰｽﾞｨｰ)の秋元と申します｡

私達は｢旅､お茶､映画｣をｺﾝｾﾌﾟﾄに｢宿泊体験｣を提供すべく､この施設を2019年8月にｵｰﾌﾟﾝしました｡

内装や音響設備といった空間にはかなりこだわっており､来て頂いた方々にはきっと非日常的な楽しい時間をお過ごし頂けると思っています｡

あなたにお会いできる事を楽しみにしております｡
どうぞ宜しくお願い致します｡

Hello
My name is Hiroyuki from TheaterZzz.

We opened this facility in August 2019 to provide an “accommodation experience” based on the concept of “travel, tea, and movies”.

The space such as the interior and sound equipment is quite particular, and I think that people who come will surely have an enjoyable extraordinary time.

We look forward to your visit.
Thank you very much.

name: Home in Taito City · ★4.41 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 shared bath
description:
MOMO HOUSEは「浅草の風情」と「上野の利便」が楽しめるゲストハウスです☆

浅草と上野の中間にあり、合羽橋のショッピングストリートまで歩いて２〜３分。浅草寺・隅田川・スカイツリー、御徒町、秋葉原も徒歩圏内。

移動に便利な上野駅から東京近郊・日本全国どこへでも♪　東京、恵比寿、六本木、渋谷、新宿、池袋、品川などの主要駅すべて乗り換えなし！　鎌倉、湘南、日光、東北などへの遠出も便利です。

浅草はアトラクションとエンターテイメントの宝庫。浅草寺、花やしき、演芸ホール（落語）、仲見世通り、人力車、水上バス、着物・サムライ・忍者体験、よりどりみどりの楽しいツアー…。また、年間を通してイベント満載。三社祭、隅田川花火大会、ほおずき市、とうろう流し、サンバ祭り…いつ来ても新しい発見のある街です。下町情緒をご満喫ください♪

ホストは南千住（山谷）、浅草で住み込みをしていたので、観光のことなど遠慮なく聞いてくださいね〜^^

＊　お部屋は、仕切りを閉めれば個室になります。キッチン、洗面、シャワー、トイレと同フロアなので、他のゲストとの接触は最小限。小グループでのご利用、お待ちしてます！　＊

The space
寝室は、木のぬくもりのある２段ベッドが並ぶドミトリー。キッチン設備には自信があります！　小さいけれどくつろげる屋上あり。ブック・コーナーあり。コモンルームには「子ども文庫」を併設していますので、ぜひ覗いてみてください。

During your stay
ホストは、バックパッカー宿・Airbnb宿にて住み込みで働いた経験がありますので、観光案内など、なんでも聞いてください！　料理や季節行事、子ども向けイベントなども実施しています。ご要望があれば、滞在中に特別開催させていただくことも。

License number
M130027796
neighborhood_overview: １階のラテアートが素敵なカフェがハウスの目印。迷わず到着できること間違いなし。合羽（かっぱ）橋は近年、外国人観光客にも人気のスポットです。ハウスの目の前にあるお寺は通称「かっぱ寺」として知られています。また、浅草寺は徒歩圏内です。
host_about:
* Lived in the U.K. and Ireland for 2 years in total. Visited about 50 countries and areas in the world including the continent of Africa. Most of the places are seaports as they were stops of Peaceboat that is a cruise ship and takes voyages from Japan to Japan––a round world literally. Took Peaceboat twice, once as a passenger, and second time as a teacher for the school on the sea through the voyage.

Worked as a reception staff living in the site for 2 and a half years at a hotel for backpackers. Stayed in an Airbnb accommodation in Asakusa for 2 years, working as a staff in the house. For over a decade, the living places were always with other people such as shared houses! 

Because of experiences working as a Montessori teacher, international school teacher, nursery teacher and nanny…, will always welcome to meet children in MOMO HOUSE. 

* ｲｷﾞﾘｽとｱｲﾙﾗﾝﾄﾞにﾄｰﾀﾙ2年滞在｡ｱﾌﾘｶを含め約50か国訪問｡ﾋﾟｰｽﾎﾞｰﾄ’地球一周の船旅’で地球2周､鉄道で日本1周｡ﾎﾃﾙﾌﾛﾝﾄｽﾀｯﾌ2年半､民泊ﾍﾙﾊﾟｰ2年､いずれも住み込み｡ﾋﾟｰｽﾎﾞｰﾄ2周目は｢子どもの家(=船上幼稚園)｣の先生として乗船｡AMI国際ﾓﾝﾃｯｿｰﾘ教師資格および日本の保育士資格ﾎﾙﾀﾞｰ｡海外でﾍﾞﾋﾞｰｼｯﾀｰも経験｡

host_about:
世界的に大流行している新型コロナ原因で観光業や飲食店など、苦しい日々を送っている人達は大勢いらっしゃる中、苦境から脱出するように頑張っている姿も大勢います。
　　これから、コロナ禍を負けずに、光り道に歩み始まっているところで、今後の観光業の復活に些細な貢献したいと想います。
　　中国語には「否极泰来」と言う諺があった、「悪運がその極に達すれば幸運が来る」と言う意味です。これから短い内に平凡な生活に戻れられると信じております。

　　　株式会社　三源　社長　ニンガツキ
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　2021  旧正月

name: Rental unit in Ōta-ku · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
description:
ビル１室を利用した宿泊施設の完全個室です。寝具はベット&布団です。35平米の広さで、部屋を十分に堪能できる空間となっています。羽田空港への交通アクセスも5分圏内と大変便利で、早朝や深夜、また次へに向かう目的地まで負担が少ない利便性高い場所です。タクシーも、国際線までなら少額の負担で利用できるでしょう。
家主は近隣在住なので、質問や困難にもすぐ対応できる環境が整っています｡当施設は大田区の特区民泊認証を取得して開始しています｡部屋は最低限の家電と調理器具を設備してますので、安心かつ快適な時間をお過ごし頂けると思います｡
同施設には１泊タイプの別部屋もあります。この305室とdelamo room401室も一緒に検討頂けたら幸いです。なお予約時に身分証明証の提示を求めますがご了承ください。またタオル設置は初日分のみとなります。
こちらファミリープランもございます。小学生以下のお子様に対して割引設定を設けてますので、まずはお問い合わせ頂けましたら幸いです（例：小学生以下１人までは無料、２人は大人１人分）。ご利用される人数の構成によってお値段交渉承りますので、まずはご連絡頂ければ幸いです。

The space
バスルームはユニットタイプになっております。お部屋奥にはソファー席とローテーブルがあります。ネット環境も整っていますので、ゆったりとした空間の中で時間をお過ごしください。

Guest access
大きなお荷物があっても問題ありません。共有のエレベーターがあり、お客様がお部屋まで荷物を転がして行けるようになってます。鍵の受け渡しは、予約成立後にお知らせいたします。

Other things to note
【お部屋の留意事項】
バスルームはユニットタイプになっております。施設に調理器具はあり、キッチンの使用は問題ございませんが、調味料の準備はご自身での対応となります。ご了承ください。

【身分証明書の提示】
環境庁より宿泊リストの提出を求められる場合があるため、事前に身分証明書の画像送信お願いしております。ご了承くださいませ。海外渡航者の方はパスポートをお願いしま
neighborhood_overview: 羽田空港近くの東京都大田区羽田が住所となります。宿までは、京浜急行線の穴守稲荷駅から徒歩３分、京急バス「弁天橋」停留所から徒歩２分となっています。こちらが主な交通機関のご案内になります。宿周辺は、羽田空港へのアクセスは大変良いのですが、飲食店が少なめの印象です。ですが、コンビニエンスストアや銭湯などは徒歩圏内に多数あり、生活必需品の購入や銭湯体験には問題ない場所となっております。
host_about: こんにちは､Nanbuです｡大田区からの認可を受けて宿泊施設をｽﾀｰﾄさせました｡宿泊利用してくださる皆さまにとって､安心できる止まり木のような心休まる時間を提供できるよう頑張ります｡ﾎｽﾄとして更なる成長を目指していきますので、何卒よろしくお願いします!!

neighborhood_overview:
"Here Monzennakacho is an irresistibly attractive city for friendly residents of Edokko and those who like downtown.
On the Fukagawa fair, which is held three times a month (1st, 15th, and 28th of every month), about 350 stalls line up on the approach to Tomioka Hachimangu and Fukagawa Fudodo and the shopping street of Eitai-dori, and the cityscape is crowded every time. Tomioka Hachimangu Shrine at night is also recommended. The majestic atmosphere that emerges in the darkness seems to have a greater presence than in the daytime. People are often seen.
If you put your hands together in silence, you will surely be able to reset your day.

In addition, there is Fukagawa Park next to Fukagawa Fudodo, and there are many small parks in the vicinity, so there is no end to the place where children can play. If you go to Kiyosumi Shirakawa, Kiyosumi Park, next to it, Izumi and Tsukiyama There is a beautiful Kiyosumi Garden, which is mainly designated as a scenic spot in To
host_about:
ホストのTakeshiです。ホストは2015年頃から始めて、今は東京の江東区、台東区、墨田区という東側のエリアを中心にいくつかの部屋の管理をしています。
渋谷と、大阪にも1軒ずつあります。

第一印象は怖いとか何を考えてるかわからないとか言われますが、これでも頑張って楽しそうにしているつもりです。

元々はサラリーマンで、デザインの仕事をしていましたので、全てではありませんが、デザインにこだわった部屋が多いと思います。

今は、オーストラリアにワーホリに行った経験から、英語の学習や話すことが好きになり、英語を学ぶシェアハウス「Y2 English House」や、Airbnbのホストをしています。

他には、中野でコワーキングスペース「FromScratch Works」を運営したり、2021年3月からは民泊のホスト様向けのオンラインサロン「minka」の共同運営も始めました。
民泊を始めたい方や、ホストの悩みや情報共有をしています。
※民泊ホストに興味がある方は、是非「minka」「オンラインサロン」で検索してみてください。


I manage this guest house with my friend Shigeo and Yoshimi.

My introduction
I like to talk to people from different countries. 

I'm a designer and also an owner of the shared house where people study English.

My purpose for doing B&B is to make people from other countries happy and to have them enjoyed the best staying in Japan.

I'd like people to know not only one side of Japan ( ex. Asakusa, Shibuya, Akihabara ), but also the other side ( local food , culture , people ).

While I'm introducing Japan to foreigners, I'd also like to have Japanese people experienced talking and hanging out with them.
People from my shared house are willing to spend time with travelers.

I like eating, drinking, reading and bourldering.


************************************************
Shigeo Kojima

Hello,
I like to introduce Japanese usual cultures.
I have a lot of wonderful friends any places in a world.
I'm a watchmaker for Swiss watch brand in Tokyo.
I like traveling, taking photos and go out drinking with my friends.

neighborhood_overview:
The University of Tokyo (東京大学 Tōkyō daigaku), abbreviated as Todai (東大 Tōdai)or UTokyo,is a public research university located in Bunkyo, Tokyo, Japan. Established in 1877 as the first imperial university, it is one of Japan's most prestigious universities.
The university has 10 faculties and enrolls about 30,000 students, 2,100 of whom are international students. Its five campuses are in Hongō, Komaba, Kashiwa, Shirokane and Nakano. It is among the top type of the select Japanese universities assigned additional funding under the MEXT's Top Global University Project to enhance Japan's global educational competitiveness.
The university has graduated many notable alumni, including 17 Prime Ministers, 16 Nobel Prize laureates, 3 Pritzker Prize laureates, 3 astronauts, and 1 Fields Medalist.

Tokyo Dome (東京ドーム Tōkyō Dōmu) is a stadium in Bunkyo, Tokyo, Japan. Construction on the stadium began on May 16, 1985, and it opened on March 17, 1988. It was built on the site of

neighborhood_overview:
房源（SAKURA）位于浅草地区。地处热门旅游城中心，您可以感受日本传统古镇。方便前往便利店、观光景点和餐厅。房源附近🈶️温泉、大超市和邮局。浅草（浅草）是浅草寺（Senso-ji Temple）和浅草神社（浅草神社）周围地区。浅草（Asakusa）一向吸引许多旅客，他们不仅来参观寺庙和神社，而且还来观看表演，歌舞伎 隅田川烟花换还可以在隅田川（Sumida River）的船上观赏这座城市。餐厅、酒吧咖啡馆提供各种各样的日本美食。
（所在地台东区拥有上野和浅草两大繁华商圈，有浅草寺、阿美横丁、东京国立博物馆、上野之森美术馆、上野恩赐公园等著名景点，当之无愧是东京最适合观光游览的地方。如果您想感受日本的人文气息和江户风情，千万不要错过台东区哦~

浅草ならではの和の空間をモチーフにしたこの部屋は、とても人気があり、ただ泊まるだけではなく雰囲気を楽しみながら過ごせる事ができます。

The space
50㎡超えの余裕のある空間です。
1階にはリビングルーム、キッチン、洗面所、シャワールーム、トイレ。
2階にはトイレと和室が２部屋あり、１部屋に最大３名、２部屋で最大６名分のお布団をご用意しております。リビング、寝室にそれぞれエアコンと床暖房が完備されています(＊'͜' )⋆*

Guest access
一棟まるまる貸切ですので1階2階とも、ご滞在中はご自由にお使いください(＊'͜' )⋆*
【竹乃宿】民宿距离浅草寺和雷門很近的，步行9分钟就可以到了。十分便捷。自家经营的合羽橋咖啡店（合羽橋コーヒー）步行3分鐘左右哦，咖啡店早上有モーニング。周边还有很多吃饭的地方，有些百年老店，也有一些特色的居酒屋，还有非常正宗的日式和牛烤肉，入口即化。上野公园的话也是蛮近的步行20几分钟左右。

Other things to note
夜間は近隣住宅に迷惑がかかる為お静かにお願い致しますm(_ _)m

name: Home in Shibuya-ku · ★4.72 · 2 bedrooms · 8 beds · 1 bath
description:
A 3 stories house in Shinjuku/Shibuya area with 2 bed rooms and a wide living room! 7 min. to Nishi-Shinjuku-5chome sta.

You will love the atmosphere of the house, cosy and welcoming.

Perfect for groups or families, you will benefit from the proximity of Shinjuku/Shibuya and the great access to the rest of the city, while staying.
With Toei Oedo Line(Metro), you will access directly to Ueno, Tsukiji, Yoyogi, and so much places!

Airport/other area pick up is available so please ask if needed!

The space
We keep clean the room by sanitizer for preventing corona virus:)

【House equipment and facilities】

- Single bed × 5
- Double mattress × 3
- Kitchen
- Toilets x 3
- Shower room x 1
- Fridge/Freezer
- Television
- Washing machine
- Air cleaner
- Coffee maker
- Electric kettle
- Microwave
- Toaster

neighborhood_overview:
7 minutes to Nishi-Shinjuku-gochome station. With Toei Oedo line you will access directly to Ueno, Shibuya, Roppongi, Tsukiji, Yoyogi, Tsukishima, Shinbashi and so much more!

【About Shinjuku】

Shinjuku is one of the most popular districts of the whole town and is well known to be one of the center of night life in Tokyo. Also the center of entertainment you will find everything there from shopping, game centers and cat cafes to robot restaurants!

Among the most famous parts of the district you will find the Kabukicho, center of entertainment that gathers plenty of bar (even girls or boys bars ^^), Izakaya type restaurants (bar/restaurant) but also the place where you will find the Godzilla cinema, immense building on the side of which there is a huge Godzilla's statue.

Next to it you will also find the famous 'Golden Gai' which gathers the most traditional bars and izakayas of the city where you non-Japanese weren't allowed until recent years!
host_about:
Hi, everyone!! Thank you very much for visiting my profile.
I’m Megumi. I’ve visited many countries for now, Korea, China, Taiwan, Guam, Hawaii, Singapore, USA, Spain, France, Italy,  Australia, New Zealand and Maldives. There I’ve stayed Airbnb house and talk with many hosts. I felt it’s interesting to entertain guests. So I have hosted countless guests coming from all around the world in Tokyo from Aug2017!! It’s my pleasure for welcoming people. If I have opportunity to talk with you, I will send you Japanese souvenir. Thank you :)

neighborhood_overview: 鐘ヶ淵は、東京都墨田区の最北部で西には隅田川が近く、河岸の散策も楽しめます。隅田川の河岸から細い路地が迷路のように入り組む下町の風景まで、鐘ヶ淵周辺の散策はとても楽しいです。また墨田区は、酎ハイが生まれた町とも言われており、鐘ヶ淵駅から東西に伸びる鐘ヶ淵通りは「酎ハイ街道」とも呼ばれています。かつては現在の数倍もの店が軒を連ねていたとも言われていますが、再開発を重ね店舗数もかなり減ってきてはいますが、元気に営業している店はまだまだあり、元気に酔っぱらっている常連たちとともに毎夜笑い声が溢れています。

Welcome to Shinjuku !

Just 10 minutes by taxi from Shinjuku Sta.
The nearest station is Takadanobaba Sta. (JR Yamanote Line, Seibu Shinjuku Line, Tokyo Metro Tozai Line), a 6 minute walk from the Waseda Exit.

Access to major spots in Tokyo are within 10-30 minutes by train !
There is a Family Mart within a 2 minute walk, so you can shop nearby during your stay.
There are many restaurants and bar around the nearest station.

We have everything you need.

Business and long-term use are welcome!

The space
PLEASE NOTE THAT THE ROOM IS ON THE 5TH FLOOR AND THERE IS NO ELEVATOR.

Enjoy your stay in Tokyo based in Takadanobaba.
host_about:
Welcome to my room.

My name is Taku and I'm a grandfather. 
I love traveling and have traveled to more than 20 countries, including Japan.

We rent two rooms in the same building in the Shinjuku area.

Please use our room as a base to enjoy Tokyo and Japan !

Feel free to send us a message if you have any questions.

ROOM

The space
If you're interested in touring around Skytree or Asakusa, this is a great place to stay.

It's not the biggest room in town, but it's a cozy place for solo-traveller, couple or a small family.

Sumidagawa fireworks will be held on July 29th, and it's very close to the venue.

You can also access to other places in Tokyo under 30mins by subway.

description:
★人数多的也可以咨询房东噢，我们同一栋楼里目前有8套公寓。

★我们的公寓位于JR山手线池袋站，池袋站可以坐电车、地铁、巴士等直达很多观光景点、奥特莱斯、机场，非常繁华。 从池袋站西口C6出口步行5分钟即可抵达我们的公寓，公寓最多可住3人。

★公寓周围有很多餐厅、药妆店、大型购物中心、24小时便利店等等（如Bic Camera/LABI/唐吉坷德/Lumine/东急百货/松本清），即使到晚上也很方便，整栋公寓我们将提供免费固定Wi-Fi。

房东是一个旅行玩家，如果您订到我们的公寓，关于你的东京出行计划她也会给您一些建议，希望可以帮助到您。

東京を代表する駅の一つでもある池袋駅から近いという好立地で､他の主要駅へのｱｸｾｽも簡単! 池袋駅西口C6出口から徒歩5分にございます貸し切りﾏﾝｼｮﾝです｡ 最大3名宿泊可能です｡ 駅周辺にはたくさんのﾚｽﾄﾗﾝやﾊﾞｰ､大きなｼｮｯﾋﾟﾝｸﾞﾓｰﾙなどがあるので飽きることはございません
◎ ｶｯﾌﾟﾙやご家族､ご友人様などの少人数ｸﾞﾙｰﾌﾟにｵｽｽﾒです｡
◎ 固定Wi-Fiも無料でご利用頂けます｡
